author: mattsse
content:
checking, 
this appears to be a blob fee calc issue during block building that we fixed when it was found in sherlock, we were using the wrong basefee when calculating the blobfee for next block
this never really materialized on sepolia
flashbots has patched afaik, let me see if we can send a quick patch for this

author: mattsse
content:
cross posting from Hoddi genesis validators TG channel

we're pretty sure we identified the problem and released 1.8.3 https://github.com/paradigmxyz/reth/releases/tag/v1.8.3
reth was incorrectly using the basefee of the payload instead of parent.basefee when computing the excess blob gas of the payload
depending on how large the basefee swing is and how much excess blob gas is currently available, this can end up computing incorrect blob fees
